question: 排水溝
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>reject</kanji> <kanji>water</kanji> <kanji>gutter</kanji> is <vocabulary>drainage</vocabulary>, which we also call a <vocabulary>drain</vocabulary>, or a <vocabulary>gutter</vocabulary>. This word covers both the drain in your sink or bathtub, and roadside gutters.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
